```{r}
# Load required package
library(ggplot2)

# Print current date and time (will appear in the rendered output)
cat("Generated on: ", format(Sys.time(), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %Z"), "\n\n")

# Create a plot of the diamonds dataset
p <- ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price, color = cut)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.6, size = 1.5) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  labs(
    title = "Diamonds: price vs carat (log10 scale)",
    subtitle = "Colored by cut",
    x = "Carat (log10 scale)",
    y = "Price (USD)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

# Print the plot
print(p)
```
